entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as fully dressed but drenched to the skin, with his hair plastered to his face. He is holding the sword of Gryﬃndor in one hand and the Horcrux in the other.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as shivering violently and unable to answer Ron's question. He is trying to get dressed.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is described as dangling from its broken chain in a parody of hypnosis.

entities.name: sword of gryﬃndor
entities.description: The sword of Gryﬃndor is described as being held by Ron.

relationships.description: Ron is holding the Horcrux in his hand.
Harry sees Ron standing before him.
Ron is holding the sword of Gryﬃndor in his hand.
